data.why:
I've developed a module for refactoring perl code. You pass in a
    snippet of perl code that you wish to move into its own sub as well
    as a name for the sub. It figures out which variable need to be
    passed in, and which are candidates to be returned. Then it
    generates the sub and a call to the sub.

    Comes with a wrapper script that lets you pass the code back and
    forth on Linux using the KDE clipboard.

    Tentatively called Dev::Refactor.
